fields.value: Combined VLA+GBT data of NH3 (1,1) and (2,2) in Orion A OMC1
Supplementary data to the paper 'Dense gas kinematics and a narrow filament in the Orion A OMC1 region using NH3', first presented in ApJ 861, 77

dsDescriptionValue.value: data files of combined GBT and VLA observations of the Orion A OMC1 region, first presented in the paper 'Dense gas kinematics and a narrow filament in the Orion A OMC1 region using NH3', first presented in ApJ 861, 77 (https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.01847)
